subject.description: Young woman with a slim, curvy figure
subject.hair: Long, sleek, straight platinum blonde hair reaching down to the lower back
subject.face: Soft glamorous makeup, neutral tones, nude lipstick, defined eyebrows, looking directly at the camera over the shoulder
subject.skin: Fair complexion, highly detailed skin texture, realistic pores, slight sheen from flash lighting

clothing.outfit: Black form-fitting maxi dress, backless design with thin strappy details across the mid-back, hugging the silhouette
clothing.accessories: Silver diamond tennis bracelet on the left wrist

pose.stance: Standing 3/4 turned away from the camera showing the back and side profile
pose.head_position: Turned over the left shoulder to face the viewer
pose.arms: Left arm hanging naturally by the side, right hand slightly pulling the dress fabric

environment.setting: Outdoor luxury resort walkway at night
environment.background_elements: Dark tropical foliage, palm trees silhouetted against the night sky
environment.atmosphere: Exclusive vacation vibe, warm tropical night

lighting.foreground_light: Bright, cool-toned flash illuminating the subject clearly against the dark background
lighting.background_light: Warm bokeh string lights (bistro lights) hanging in the distance, low-level garden lanterns emitting a golden glow on the ground

camera_settings.quality: Raw photo, hyper-realistic, sharp focus on subject, cinematic lighting

mood: Sultry, elegant, confident, high-end nightlife, cinematic
